name: Nucular Fielded Full Text Indexing
short_description: Nucular Archiving System for creating full text indices for fielded data. Python API, web, and command line interfaces. Fast. Very light weight. Concurrent read/writes with no possible locking issues. No server process. Proximity. Facets. Funny name.
